main.java.model

Class RREFMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.model.Matrix
      • main.java.model.RREFMatrix

  • public class RREFMatrix
extends Matrix
    Reduced Row Echelon Form matrix class.
    Author:
    Isaac Jordan

    • Property Summary

      • Properties inherited from class main.java.model.Matrix

        createdDateProperty, nameProperty, numColsProperty, numRowsProperty

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RREFMatrix(Matrix parent)
      Creates the reduced row echelon form of the parent matrix.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean stepOne(Matrix A, int i, int j)
      If A[i][j] = 0 swap the ith row with some other row (A[i+b]) below to make A[i][j] not 0.
      static void stepThree(Matrix A, int i, int j)
      Eliminate all other entries in the jth column by subtracting suitable multiples of the ith row from the other rows
      static void stepTwo(Matrix A, int i, int j)
      Divide the ith row by A[i][j] to make the pivot entry = 1

    • Method Detail

      • stepOne

        public static boolean stepOne(Matrix A,
                              int i,
                              int j)
        If A[i][j] = 0 swap the ith row with some other row (A[i+b]) below to make A[i][j] not 0. This A[i][j], non-zero entry is called a pivot. If all entries in the column are zero, increase j by 1
        Parameters:
        A -
        i -
        j -
        Returns:

      • stepTwo

        public static void stepTwo(Matrix A,
                           int i,
                           int j)
        Divide the ith row by A[i][j] to make the pivot entry = 1
        Parameters:
        A -
        i -
        j -
